meanings.definition: A bony growth projecting outward from a bone surface.
meanings.sent1: The exostosis on his knee caused discomfort when he walked.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the exostosis needed to be surgically removed.
meanings.sent3: The exostosis on the bone looked like a tiny mountain trying to escape.
meanings.sent4: Her exostosis was like a stubborn rock sticking out of the bone.
meanings.sent5: The exostosis felt like a small bump under his skin.

meanings.definition: The condition of having such a growth.
meanings.sent1: She was diagnosed with exostosis after experiencing pain in her arm.
meanings.sent2: Living with exostosis can sometimes be challenging.
meanings.sent3: His exostosis condition made him feel like a walking bone museum.
meanings.sent4: The exostosis condition seemed like an unwanted bone accessory.
meanings.sent5: Dealing with exostosis was like carrying a bone bump everywhere.
